<?php
function distance2($latA, $lonA, $latB, $lonB) 
{
    $latA = deg2rad($latA);
    $lonA = deg2rad($lonA);
    $latB = deg2rad($latB);
    $lonB = deg2rad($lonB);

    $deltaLat = ($latA - $latB);
    $deltaLon = ($lonA - $lonB);

    $d = sin($deltaLat/2) * sin($deltaLat/2) +
        cos($latA) * cos($latB) * sin($deltaLon/2) * sin($deltaLon/2);
    $d = 2 * asin(sqrt($d));
    return $d * 6371.01;
}
